ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4  boneless pork chops, 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon vinegar, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons cornstarch,   +   1/2 cup pineapple juice
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 910mg 40%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 6%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 15g, Vitamin C 3mg 17%, Calcium 22mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 268mg 6%
